description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
 

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy, on-the-go learning app to help you get started on Kannada language. A beginner's guide that teaches you the basics in a nice and organized manner.  Fast, easy, and fun way to learn Kannada.


Features include phrasebook, and tutorials.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Kannada, anytime, anywhere!

Meeting friends and co-workers from India could be much more fun with this app. Focus is on everyday phrases and words.

App Tools include search, bookmark, and facebook integration.



Includes following tutorials:

Tips for Effective Language Learning.


Includes following phrasebooks:

Greetings and General Words,
Phrases for Courtesy,
Food, Drink, and Going Out,
Places, People, and Family,
Travelling Around,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping.



What is unique about WAGmob apps? 

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A WAGmob app in every pocket.

Please write to us at Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
